facet_1.name: Bone Guard
facet_1.effects: Bone Guard is Wraith King's second ability with the selected facet. The King can summon skeletons to fight for him.

facet_2.name: Spectral Blade
facet_2.effects: Spectral Blade is Wraith King's second ability with the selected facet. Curses and deals a flat bonus damage and a percentage of the attack damage again within a delay.

effects: Becomes an aura affecting allied heroes within the radius, transforming them into wraiths, and delaying their death
Allied heroes who die with the Wraith Form aura applied to them have a quicker respawn time
Grants self outgoing attack damage bonus while Wraith Form is active, and while Mortal Strike is off cooldown
No longer has a mana cost

level_20: +5 Bone Guard Skeletons Spawned / -25% Spectral Blade Curse Cooldown
level_10: +2s Wraithfire Blast Slow Duration / +15% Spectral Blade Curse Damage

abilities.name: Vampiric Spirit
abilities.description: Delays the death of Wraith King when killed. The King enters Wraith Form, granting himself unobstructed movement with bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed for a short duration. Grants Wraith King and his Skeleton Warriors' attacks lifesteal.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Reincarnation. The Reincarnation active component is inactive during Wraith Form.

ability_1.name: Wraithfire Blast
ability_1.details: Sears an enemy unit with a spectral fire projectile that stuns and damages on hit, then slows and damages over time.
ability_1.description: Sears an enemy unit with a spectral fire projectile that stuns and damages on hit, then slows and damages over time.

facet_effects.bone_guard: Orders all of the current Skeleton Guards to attack the unit-targeted enemy upon cast

interaction_notes: Nullified by spell block upon projectile impact
Procs spell reflection upon projectile impact
Can be disjointed by turning invisible

ability_2.name: Bone Guard
ability_2.details: The King can summon skeletons to fight for him. Accrues charges per enemy unit the King or any unit he control kills.
ability_2.description: The King can summon skeletons to fight for him.
technical_details: Base number of skeletons: 0 (5 with talent)
interaction_notes: Skeletons benefit from Vampiric Spirit's ability effects
Skeletons respawn once when killed with 3 second delay

ability_3.name: Spectral Blade
ability_3.details: Curses and deals a flat bonus damage and a percentage of the attack damage again within a delay.
ability_3.description: Curses and deals a flat bonus damage and a percentage of the attack damage again within a delay.
technical_details: Attack damage to damage factor: 0.5 (0.75 with talent)
interaction_notes: The curse damage applies lifesteal based on Vampiric Spirit's ability values
Has a shorter downtime on creeps
Removes all current Spectral Blade downtime debuffs on affected enemy heroes when Reincarnation procs

ability_4.name: Mortal Strike
ability_4.details: Passively deals critical damage on an attack with a cooldown.
ability_4.description: Passively deals critical damage on an attack with a cooldown.
interaction_notes: Mortal Strike is an ensured critical strike source
Missed attacks neither proc Mortal Strike nor put it on cooldown
With Shard: Grants self outgoing attack damage bonus while Wraith Form is active, and while Mortal Strike is off cooldown

ability_5.name: Reincarnation
ability_5.details: The Wraith King reforms after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Applies a movement speed slow and an attack speed slow upon death to enemy heroes within the radius when off-cooldown.
ability_5.description: The Wraith King reforms after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.

facet_effects.bone_guard: While regrouping through Reincarnation, Skeletons are summoned to attack each nearby enemy hero within the radius
facet_effects.spectral_blade: Removes all current Spectral Blade downtime debuffs on affected enemy heroes when Reincarnation procs

interaction_notes: Self-casting this ability instantly kills the Wraith King
The Reincarnation active component is inactive during Wraith Form
With talent: Wraithfire Blast of the corresponding level fully replaces the slow component upon proc
With Shard: No longer has a mana cost

changes: Reduced base movement speed from 315 to 310
Reduced Vampiric Spirit lifesteal from 16%/24%/32%/40% to 10%/20%/30%/40%
CHANGED Reincarnation ability operations: No longer pauses the ability cooldown while the Wraith Form component is active, Cannot proc while the Wraith Form component is active
Bone Guard now considers non-Skeleton Warrior denies as valid unit kill count
Reduced Wraithfire Blast cooldown from 17/14/11/8 to 14/12/10/8
Bone Guard: Reduced cooldown from 50 to 42, Increased Wraith King Skeleton duration from 40 to 46
Increased Reincarnation mana cost from 200 to 225
Talents: LVL 10 +25%/-25% Bone Guard duration/cooldown → +2s Wraithfire Blast slow duration
Bone Guard now grants 2 Wraith King Skeleton charges per hero kill
Talents: LVL 10 +25% Wraithfire Blast first damage/damage per second → +25%/-25% Bone Guard duration/cooldown or -25% Spectral Blade curse cooldown
LVL 20 +60 attack speed → +5 Bone Guard skeletons/+15% Spectral Blade curse damage
